home.title: Belgian Medication Search
home.tagline: Search medications, compare prices, and find generic equivalents
home.searchMedicationsDesc: Find by name, CNK code, or ingredient
home.dataSourceNote: Data from Belgium's official SAM database

search.title: Search Medications
search.description: Find medications by name, CNK code, or active ingredient
search.hintMinChars: Enter at least 3 characters to search
search.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your search terms or search type
search.resultCount: {count, plural, =0 {No results found} =1 {Found 1 result} other {Found # results}}
search.resultsAnnouncement: {count, plural, =1 {1 result found} other {# results found}}
search.companyFilterHint: Filter results by company actor number
search.genericFilterHint: Filter results by generic product code (VMP)
search.emptyStateDescription: Enter a medication name, CNK code, or ingredient above
search.companyFilterDisabledHint: Company filter is not available when searching by ingredient. Use name search instead.
search.takingLonger: This is taking longer than expected. Large result sets may require additional filters.

medication.therapeuticAlternativesDesc: Other formulations in the same therapeutic group
medication.noSwitchWarning: Note: Switching between formulations in this group may not be recommended
medication.noGenericWarning: Note: Generic prescription is not available for this group
medication.noOtherFormulations: No other formulations available in this therapeutic group

compare.title: Compare Medications
compare.searchHint: Search by CNK code, medication name, or ingredient to find generic equivalents and compare prices.
compare.noResults: No medications found. Try a different search term.
compare.noEquivalents: No generic equivalents found for this medication.
compare.noVmpLink: This medication is not linked to a generic product group.
compare.emptyStateTitle: Search for a medication to compare
compare.emptyStateDesc: We'll find all generic equivalents and compare prices for you.

priceComparison.title: Generic Equivalents
priceComparison.viewFullComparison: View full comparison with patient costs
priceComparison.noEquivalents: No equivalent medications found for comparison.

company.title: Pharmaceutical Companies
company.searchHint: Enter at least 3 characters to search
company.emptyStateDesc: Enter at least 3 characters to search

reimbursement.title: Reimbursement
reimbursement.noInfo: No reimbursement information available for this medication.

ingredients.excipientDataUnavailable: Excipient data not available for this medication

chapterIV.title: Chapter IV Medication
chapterIV.requiresPriorAuth: This medication requires prior authorization from your health insurer
chapterIV.doctorMustSubmit: Your doctor must submit a request before you can receive reimbursement
chapterIV.learnMoreAriaLabel: Learn more about Chapter IV prior authorization requirements (opens in new tab)

acronym.CNK: Code National Kode - Belgian national product code (7 digits)
acronym.VMP: Virtual Medicinal Product - Generic product grouping
acronym.AMP: Actual Medicinal Product - Specific branded medication
acronym.AMPP: Actual Medicinal Product Package - Specific package of a medication
acronym.ATC: Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical - WHO classification system
acronym.VTM: Virtual Therapeutic Moiety - Active substance grouping
acronym.RIZIV: Rijksinstituut voor Ziekte- en Invaliditeitsverzekering - Belgian health insurance institute
acronym.INAMI: Institut National d'Assurance Maladie-Invalidité - Belgian health insurance (French)
acronym.MA: Marketing Authorization - Official approval number for the medication
acronym.AMM: Autorisation de Mise sur le Marché - Official approval number for the medication (French)
acronym.HVB: Handelsvergunning - Official approval number for the medication (Dutch)
acronym.ZNr: Zulassungsnummer - Official approval number for the medication (German)
acronym.SmPC: Summary of Product Characteristics - Detailed information for healthcare professionals
acronym.RCP: Résumé des Caractéristiques du Produit - Product information document (French)
acronym.SKP: Samenvatting van de Productkenmerken - Product information document (Dutch)

dosage.title: Standard Dosage
dosage.noInfo: Standard dosage information not available for this medication.
dosage.consultSmPC: Consult the SmPC for dosing guidance.
dosage.disclaimer: Reference information only. Verify with official product documentation and clinical judgment.
dosage.timesPerDay: {count, plural, =1 {once daily} =2 {twice daily} =3 {3 times daily} other {# times daily}}
dosage.maxTimesPerDay: {count, plural, =1 {max once daily} other {max # times daily}}
